price: Na wanapo rudi kwa watu wao hurudi nao wamefurahi.
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
footnotes: Na hao wakosefu wakirejea kwa ahali zao hurejea kwa furaha na kuona ladha kwa vile kuwakejeli Waumini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
